title: J. Allen Brack Out at Blizzard - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.03.21
description:
Gary Whitta wanted heads to roll after the details of the Activision Blizzard lawsuit came out, and now, J. Allen Brack is out at the company. Let's talk about it!

Time Stamps -

00:09:04 - Housekeeping

00:36:00 - Ads

00:46:43 - Water Wet, GTAV unstoppable
00:49:15 - Master Chief is in your Car
00:53:00 - New Xbox Controller Color
00:57:50 - Out today 
01:02:20 - You‘re Wrong
